ValidationRule.description:
Annual Revenue Loss Avoidance cannot be zero if Business Risk Severity is selected as No Impact and Gate is Opportunity.
-- Created as part of CR00032940 | IT-REQ-1779
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Gate__c, 'Opportunity') && ISPICKVAL( Business_Risk_Severity__c , 'No impact') && Annual_Revenue_Loss_Avoidance__c = 0
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Annual Revenue Loss Avoidance should be more than zero.
